items.question: What is Nano Banana Ultra?
items.answer: Nano Banana Ultra is an independent optimization platform that helps you get Ultra-level results from Nano Banana AI models. Enter a few words, and our Intent Mining engine expands it into a professional prompt‚Äîthen generates stunning images using Nano Banana or Nano Banana Pro. Note: Nano Banana Ultra is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or sponsored by Google or its Nano Banana models.

items.question: Is Nano Banana Ultra the same as Nano Banana Pro?
items.answer: No. Nano Banana and Nano Banana Pro are AI image generation models developed by Google. Nano Banana Ultra is our independent optimization platform that helps you craft better prompts and get Ultra-level quality from these models.

items.question: Is Nano Banana Ultra free to use?
items.answer: Yes! You can generate prompts for free without signing up‚Äîup to 3 times per day. Register to get free credits for image generation. Need more? Check our pricing page for credit packages.

items.question: Can I generate images on Nano Banana Ultra?
items.answer: Yes. Our Live Logic Lab lets you generate both the optimized prompt and an instant image preview using Nano Banana models. You can also copy the prompt to use with other AI image tools.

items.question: Do I need prompt engineering skills?
items.answer: Not at all. Just enter a simple idea like 'portrait' or 'sunset beach'. Our Intent Mining Engine analyzes your intent and automatically adds professional details‚Äîlighting, composition, style, and more.

items.question: What's the difference between Banana and Banana Pro modes?
items.answer: These refer to the AI models we use for generation. Banana mode uses the lightweight Nano Banana model for quick, coherent results‚Äîperfect for everyday use. Banana Pro mode uses the advanced Nano Banana Pro model for deep semantic expansion with higher fidelity output.

items.question: How does Smart Refinement work?
items.answer: Smart Refinement lets you fine-tune your prompts with a single click. Adjust lighting, camera angle, style, and other parameters without typing‚Äîjust select from the options and watch your prompt evolve.

items.question: Can I use prompts from the community gallery?
items.answer: Absolutely. Browse our gallery, find a style you love, and click 'Remix' to use it as your starting point. Every creation includes the full prompt‚Äîcopy it, customize it, and make it your own.

items.question: Can I use the prompts commercially?
items.answer: Yes. You own the prompts you create on Nano Banana Ultra and can use them for any purpose. For images generated on our platform, please review our terms of service for commercial use details.

ai_image_generator_faq.title: AI Image Generator FAQ
ai_image_generator_faq.description: Common questions about our AI image generation tool.

items.question: What is Nano Banana Ultra AI Image Generator?
items.answer: Nano Banana Ultra is a cutting-edge web tool that allows anyone to create professional images using artificial intelligence. It transforms text descriptions into visuals and can even edit existing photos using advanced models like Gemini and FLUX.

items.question: Is Nano Banana Ultra AI Image Generator free?
items.answer: Yes, we offer free daily credits for all users. You can generate high-quality AI images using Gemini and other models without any subscription.

items.question: Can I use generated images for commercial purposes?
items.answer: Yes! Images generated on Nano Banana Ultra come with a commercial usage license, meaning you own the rights to your creations for marketing, products, or creative projects.

items.question: How does the Image-to-Image feature work?
items.answer: Image-to-Image allows you to upload an existing photo as a reference. The AI then uses your text prompts to modify the image's style, composition, or details while preserving the core structure of your upload.

items.question: Which AI models are supported?
items.answer: We support multiple state-of-the-art models including Google Gemini, OpenAI GPT-4o, and FLUX.1 for diverse artistic styles, from photorealistic to anime.

items.question: How do I write effective prompts?
items.answer: Be specific about subject, style, lighting, and mood. You can also use our built-in 'AI Prompt Optimizer' to automatically enhance your simple ideas into professional prompts.

items.question: What formats are the images downloaded in?
items.answer: Images are provided in high-resolution PNG or JPG formats, optimized for both web use and printing.
